Comments.Message: Java 7 Update 131 is very old. You are using a MSI or a EXE for Installation?

Hi, error code 643 is a generic code for "Install Failed".
Do you have tryed to launch the EXE manually on the computer to see if any error message show up ?

Hi,

I could see the the Java is got installed on the machines, but in the WSUS Package Publisher console it shows as failed..

Your WindowsUpdate.log shows an error. Try the MSI to install.  Read http://www.klaus-hartnegg.de/gpo/msi_java7.html from Extract the MSI-file and extract the MSI File. Create a new Update with the MSI.
